attributes.action: Citezens against 660 new homes in Atherstone
attributes.additional_details: 660 homes are planned to be built in Atherstone's countryside, We have no Police force to protect them, no spaces in schools to educate them, and no appointments at the doctors to cure them, on top of this the area they plan on building on is flood plains. We want this kind of development to stop, not just the 660 that we face now but the many requests for planning permission for similar developments.
